name: Hamster Ball (S2021 Team 22)
description:
Description: Hello, dear hamster friend! You have just escaped from cages and now on a run to escape. Move as quickly as possible to get out, otherwise, you will be caught! The time is limited, so get comfy with rolling and jumping. Get the keys, open the doors, avoid monsters, and keep trying. You will get out!

Instructions: Use "A" and "D" keys to roll around. Starting from level 2,   jump by clicking close to the hamster ball.
